structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH
GRANTS TO UNITED STATES OF LANDS AND RIGHTS TO ACQUIRE

law.catch_line: Letter accepting jurisdiction by United States to be entered upon executive journal.
law.text: Whenever the United States accepts the cession of jurisdiction over any area, the letter of acceptance shall be entered upon the executive journal.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 217, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1954.
